title: Italianissimo 2: intermediate: a multimedia course for learning Italian
brief_description: This set of audio cassettes contain all the conversations from the course book as well as ten profile interviews recorded in Italy for the course. Learners are encouraged to take part in the conversational activities intended to develop their ability to understand and speak Italian. The cassettes are designed to be used with the course book, but can be used independently. The course book and videos may be borrowed as separate loan items.
